title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.8 - Public hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.8 - Public hearing

State Regulations

On the day set for the hearing, or on such adjourned days
as may be set, the commission will receive such testimony as may be presented
by the parties in the proceeding and listen to such arguments as may be made. Briefs may be required or permitted to be filed. A stenographic record of the
hearing will be taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
603.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
